sentence_evaluations.sentence: This enzyme is crucial for the formation of glycan structures that are integral to the extracellular matrix and cell surface molecules, influencing processes such as cell signaling, adhesion, and migration (Trimarco2022Cellular; Huffman2011Polymorphisms).

Additionally, B3GAT1 has been implicated in immune responses and antiviral defense mechanisms, highlighting its potential clinical significance (Trimarco2022Cellular).
